author: live4JC1984
body:
- LMT for aerospace
- STOR or O for REITs
- MRK, ABBV, ABT for medical/pharma
- MMP or PSX for oil (midstream)
- NÉE for utility
- F or GM as they move hard into EV space
- MMM, GWW, CAT, or GLW for industrials

author: SeniorSloppySlit
body: Hold until closer to product releases/announcement. Side note GLW is also a decent stock to tie to big Apple events.
